abstract: Pandit B Sharma, Cong party Labor member, acts to block working com 'quit India' resolution; All-India Nationalist conf rejects civil disobedience movement, asks immediate pledge of Atlantic Charter benefits after war and urges immediate Brit Govt declaration of pol freedom and equal partnership in Indo-Brit Commonwealth with right to withdraw
